name: ts-for-gir
description: Typescript .d.ts generator from GIR for gjs or node-gtk

scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run regress && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.test:ava: npm run build:ts && npm run build:test:ava && ava tmp/test/ava/test.js
scripts.test:girs: git submodule update --init && npm run build:ts && npm run build:test:girs && npm run validate:gjs
scripts.regress: npm run clear && npm run build:ts && node bin/run generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.regress.rc.js' && npm run validate
scripts.build: npm run clear:build && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:test:girs: rm -rf ./test/girs/@types/Gjs && node bin/run generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.test.rc.js' && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" tsc --noEmit ./test/girs/@types/Gjs/*.ts
scripts.validate: npm run validate:gjs && npm run validate:node
scripts.clear: npm run clear:build && npm run clear:types
scripts.lint: npm run clear && npm run build:ts -- --noEmit && eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx --fix
